comments:
Build 20021015

When checking out a bunch of changes from CVS, many editors previously opened 
onto stale units (on repository, units have moved to different package 
location), did not close automatically.

When selecting them, the log got populated with following stack dumps.
Other than the log, the behavior was acceptable, though I would have preferred 
if it had warned me once for all stale editors (close|close all|cancel).
